â€œ5 Plants (3 indoor, 2 outdoor) only 1 turned purple(left it outside during cold nights).

Really nice smell, quite good harvest anr very potent effects. Lets you sleep tight.â€

â€œGrew 6 indoors with 600w hps 2 went purple. Veg stage for 30 days. Followed for 70 last 10 days i flushed. I ended up with about 12 ounces fully dried and cured. Very shocked by how potent this strain is!â€

â€œOriginally picked this up to deal with my daily headaches, and while it did not help me in that area, it did take my mind off of it enough to help me sleep. A little of this and I got drowsy and wanted my bed, but a little more and I started thinking deeply about human consciousness. Pretty good bud nonethelessâ€
â€œDefinitely a new found favorite, don't actually see the purple" but dispensaries don't lie. (Do they?) You'll know when you've smoked this strain the first hit you take

column3: â€œReally easy strain to grow, i'm a newbie but it was fun for me ! When vaping, it tastes really good :). I would recommand it. Peace âœŒï¸â€
â€œGrowed it outdoor, one of the plant's leaves went all purple but the buds stayed greens. Highly resinous strain, it has a strong pine wood taste. Stoning effect, perfect for bedtime.â€
â€œBig fan of this. After the first hit you get a jolt of energy then your body starts to really get relaxed, but your mind stays active.â€

â€œFirst of all, it doesn't turn purple at all with my 6 pots. This is very sad. Growing is very easy, cloning  is easy too. Yield is good enough. Smell and taste is nice deep aroma.Effect is indica one. No head high and heavy body buzz.,which I don't like so much. It is good for couch locking and sleep.â€

â€œIt's easy to grow. Flowering took 62 days from switching to 12/12. It wasn't purple, but I had the temperature above 23Câ° The smell during flowering wasn't hard. 
Definitely It needs curing after harvest. The vape smells and tastes very good, but I expected a bit more from the effect.â€
